articles.author: STAFF REPORTS
articles.title: Passenger dead, two ejected from van
articles.description: RAYMONDVILLE — A car crash yesterday afternoon sent seven to the hospital and left one dead.

articles.author: STAFF REPORT
articles.title: San Benito woman killed in Sunday night crash
articles.description: Alcohol may have played a role in a crash in which a 22-year-old San Benito woman was killed after driving head-on into an oncoming car, sending three people to the hospital.

articles.author: STAFF REPORT
articles.title: DPS investigating fatal two-car crash on F.M. 1425 in Mercedes
articles.description: The Texas Department of Public Safety is investigating a fatal two-car crash that occurred Wednesday morning in Mercedes.

articles.author: DIANA EVA MALDONADO | STAFF WRITER
articles.title: Children critically hurt when car strikes Harlingen home
articles.description: A number of children were hurt Thursday night when a car slammed into the front yard of a Harlingen home.

articles.author: RAUL GARCIA | STAFF WRITER
articles.title: Hit-and-run suspect has DWI rap sheet
articles.description: MERCEDES — The man accused of leaving one woman dead and three children in critical condition after a hit-and-run crash in Mercedes has a rap sheet of DWIs dating back 17 years.

articles.author: FERNANDO DEL VALLE | STAFF WRITER
articles.title: Raymondville Police seeking hit-and-run suspect
articles.description: RAYMONDVILLE — Police have a suspect in the hit-and-run accident that critically injured a cyclist.

articles.author: MOLLY SMITH | STAFF WRITER
articles.title: Border Patrol, healthcare workers discuss checkpoint protocol for EMS transports
articles.description: EDINBURG — Ten thousand vehicles pass through the Falfurrias checkpoint every day, most of them personal vehicles, commuter buses and commercial tractor trailers. While not as common, ambulances also pass through to transport patients to higher-level care fac…
